May 2019 - November 2019

FullStack Developer

Nimbus Technology

developments with different types of technologies and platforms. Oriented to Smartphones, I have developed mobile applications for satellite tracking, automotive scheduling and financial management in IONIC and Android Studio/Java. In Backend I have worked developing systems in MVC with Laravel framework and Ruby On Rails. I have created control tools in .NET(C#) MVC/RAZOR. I have also developed Listeners in Java for decoding frames in their protocols from GPS devices. With database I work with SQL and Mysql, developing models for platforms and dimensional cubes for Business Intelligence, creating SP for calculations and with Redis to manage queuing efficiently. In Frontend I use technologies like React/Vue/Javascript/Jquery, CSS/SCSS, Bootstrap to create views. Creation of RESTful WebServices with the corresponding standards with PHP/SLIM 3/APIDOC and Ruby On Rails, SOAP. All of the above versioned with tools like GIT. I have worked on the platforms in different environments, Linux/Linux with Docker, Unix and Windows, in clouds such as AWS, Azure and Digital Ocean.

February 2018 - November 2020

FullStack Developer

Responsible for developing web applications, using languages such as PHP, Javascript, Jquery, CSS with interaction with databases in Mysql and MongoDB. Achievements in development of survey viewing platforms for clients such as Banco Estado, Entel, Telefónica and Copec, among others. Handling and creation of WebServices, flash components, creation of calculation procedures for mathematical models, management of servers and virtualization in Linux. Interests

I am a creative, responsible and initiative person, always characterized by meeting the imposed goals and always going further in achieving the objectives. Objectives met in the areas where I have developed while maintaining an excellent working relationship with my past employers with verifiable references in this regard, are facts that mark my way of acting in the professional field. I have the ability and experience to coordinate work teams with people and with optimal and conciliatory results. I am looking for the opportunity to develop myself in a serious company with specific objectives and in which I can put my skills to the limit in order to improve them day by day.

I have a beautiful family, as a hobby I like to watch movies and series, play some musical instruments and go out to nature.
